title: Olymel S.E.C./ L.P. Recalls Pork Products Produced Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 6, 2018 Olymel S.E.C./ L.P., an Alberta, Canada establishment, is recalling approximately 4,618 pounds of raw intact pork products because the products were imported from Canada and not presented for import re-inspection upon entry into the United States, the U.S. Department of Agricultures...
